description:
Eug begins performing the suspiciously delicious-looking ritual to bring Vritra back to his full, stable form. However, things don`t seem to be going exactly as Eug claims.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Suppose the Villain Starts Appearing On and Off Like the Middle Part of a Movie?
Tatoeba Eiga no Chuuban no You ni Akuyaku ga Chirachira Suru Climax Ippotemae
たとえば映画の中盤のように悪役がチラチラするクライマックス一歩手前
